1
box Pillsbury\8482 refrigerated pie crusts, softened as directed on box
1/3
cup butter or margarine
cup chopped onion
cup all-purpose flour
1/2
teaspoon salt
1/4
teaspoon pepper
1 3/4
cups Progresso\8482 chicken broth (from 32-oz carton)
cup milk
2 1/2
cups shredded cooked chicken or turkey
2
cups frozen mixed vegetables, thawed
